channel.title: Zaradomin-Scape V3 Final
channel.description:
I have been working on this for a long time and if you one of the people who thought i had leeched my v1 please go away as you are really stubborn to convince I started this base out of Mod Allstar Which was good in the past before Delta was released i think [This wasnt popular as i had never hosted it much and just worked on coding it] I have lessened the amount of teleports on the Emote tab and will be moving them to a spellbook and there will be [Features] 99.99% full fletching thanks to tj007razor full firemaking to tj007razor Devo's npc drop system from Delta-(no more item2.java anymore) Thieving - from wL v3 preloading models on client-(there will be less shitty ones) Remove treasure trails and clues bout 90% Graham's eventmanager fixed the beard glitch in v2 npc walking tiles - dopert autocasting - 50% got to fix players fixed eating food-a glitch where you need to weild a weapon to eat food if no weapon isnt weilded you cant eat staff has unlimited runes-air staff gives unlimited air runes for all spell and earth staff gives unlimited earth runes and so on stopped people with symbols-if i logon with Zaradomin! itll remove the ! and itll just say Zaradomin(stops impersonators from posing as you) all 508 gs stance Fixed Defence Crosssbow ftw =p emotes for them [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/Recker450/emotetab.png[/img] The New Home Not quite done[still working on it] [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/Recker450/home.png[/img] Here are some Youtube videos 508 gs stance using swat's anim not to overwrite some anim in v2 it overwrote now it doesnt http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7wlpdt6IWQY Fixing Broken Barrows http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=plpglB6KkGQ Devolution(Dodian Npc's drop system on czar) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JEqu9HJULU Guthan healing http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URtLOUgKR74 Dharok Pwns with less hp http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3T4O7aBnq0 525 stand anim http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xv1RcUAzIyA [Working on now] -Cbow system since only delta has the c'bow system- with the c'bow i am working to make it different uses so they cannot use rune arrows on a c' bow and bolts on a bow -an Anti leech for the faggot afg
for the people who still think i leeched my v1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RTdmcodEMo
Ill take more pics and videos later
Reason of Anti Leeches is needed [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/Recker450/reneisstubborn.jpg[/img]

item.title: Zaradomin-Scape V3 Final
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

I have been working on this for a long time
and if you one of the people who thought i had leeched my v1 please go away as you are really stubborn to convince

I started this base out of Mod Allstar Which was good in the past before Delta was released i think
[This wasnt popular as i had never hosted it much and just worked on coding it]

I have lessened the amount of teleports on the Emote tab and will be moving them to a spellbook and there will be

[Features]
99.99% full fletching thanks to tj007razor
full firemaking to tj007razor
Devo’s npc drop system from Delta-(no more item2.java anymore)
Thieving - from wL v3
preloading models on client-(there will be less shitty ones)
Remove treasure trails and clues bout 90%
Graham’s eventmanager
fixed the beard glitch in v2
npc walking tiles - dopert
autocasting - 50% got to fix players
fixed eating food-a glitch where you need to weild a weapon to eat food if no weapon isnt weilded you cant eat
staff has unlimited runes-air staff gives unlimited air runes for all spell and earth staff gives unlimited earth runes and so on
stopped people with symbols-if i logon with Zaradomin! itll remove the ! and itll just say Zaradomin(stops impersonators from posing as you)
all 508 gs stance
Fixed Defence
Crosssbow ftw =p

emotes for them

The New Home Not quite done[still working on it]

home.png772×497

Here are some Youtube videos

508 gs stance using swat’s anim not to overwrite some anim in v2 it overwrote now it doesnt

Fixing Broken Barrows

Devolution(Dodian Npc’s drop system on czar)

Guthan healing

Dharok Pwns with less hp

525 stand anim

[Working on now]
-Cbow system since only delta has the c’bow system- with the c’bow i am working to make it different uses so they cannot use rune arrows on a c’ bow and bolts on a bow
-an Anti leech for the faggot afg

for the people who still think i leeched my v1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RTdmcodEMo

Ill take more pics and videos later

Reason of Anti Leeches is needed [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/Recker450/reneisstubborn.jpg[/img]
